sense.gloss: something worthless, something not worth considering, crap
sophism, chop logic, far-fetched argument, quibble, cavil, argument for argument's sake

k_ele.e: 屁と火事はもとから騒ぐ

r_ele.r: へとかじはもとからさわぐ

sense.gloss: it is often the originator of problems who kicks up a fuss or complains loudest, the one who smelt it dealt it

r_ele.r: へをひってしりつぼめ
へをひってしりすぼめ

sense.gloss: there is no use shutting the stable door after the horse has bolted, squeezing your buttocks after you have farted
first person to say something, first person to suggest something
x: 言い出しべ・いいだしべ

sense.gloss: something easy to do, cinch, a kappa's fart
stinky bug (esp. the bombardier beetle), stink bug
final emergency measure, final defence when one is cornered (defense)

k_ele.e: 沈香も焚かず屁も放らず
沈香も焚かず屁もひらず

r_ele.r: じんこうもたかずへもひらず

sense.gloss: having few faults as well as few virtues, not burning agarwood (incense); not passing wind

x: 屁っ放り虫・へっぴりむし・1

sense.gloss: not give a damn, not care a bit
stink bomb, foul odour emitted from the anal sacs of a frightened weasel
stink bomb, foul odour emitted from the anal sacs of a frightened weasel
of no concern, nothing, trivial, not even a fart

k_ele.e: 屁の突っ張りにもならない
屁のつっぱりにもならない

r_ele.r: へのつっぱりにもならない

sense.gloss: of no use whatsoever, good for nothing, useless
skunkvine (Paederia foetida), stinkvine, Chinese fever vine
first person to say something, first person to suggest something
musical farting, making various amusing farting sounds

r_ele.r: ひゃくにちのせっぽうへひとつ

sense.gloss: single mistake which ruins all one's hard work, one blunder rendering a long period of effort useless, one fart in a hundred days of sermons
farting into one's hand, cupping a fart
female servant hired to take the blame for a noblewoman's farts

sdata.j: オレ、↑教室↑↓きょうしつ↓で↑屁↑↓へ↓をこいちゃったんっすよ。んでもって↑先生↑↓せんせい↓に↑追↑↓お↓い↑出↑↓だ↓されちゃって。
sdata.e: I farted in class, and the teacher threw me out.

sdata.j: ↑屁理屈↑↓へりくつ↓ばかり↑並↑↓なら↓べて、お↑前↑↓まえ↓の↑言↑↓い↓ってること↑全然↑↓ぜんぜん↓↑筋↑↓すじ↓が↑通↑↓とお↓ってないよ。
sdata.e: All you do is string together a bunch of farfetched ideas. I can't understand a word of it.

sdata.j: お↑前↑↓まえ↓の↑屁理屈↑↓へりくつ↓はもう↑聞↑↓き↓き↑飽↑↓あ↓きたよ。
sdata.e: I'm tired of hearing you pull arguments out of who knows where.

sdata.j: ↑俺↑↓おれ↓らの↑問題↑↓もんだい↓なんて、あいつのと↑比↑↓くら↓べたら↑屁↑↓へ↓でもないんだよ。
sdata.e: Our problems are nothing compared to his.
